--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Nigthlight:
> 
> "Where we go?"said the femme while she tried hide her fear.
> 
> 
> *********************************************
> Hydras:
> 
> Hydras received a signal and said by com link, using a private 
> chanel, to all his troops and jhiaxus troops "We have company, maxis 
> found us and is just matter of time that they come. Perceptor, I want
> you to do this" Hydras send a criptic message"Telos and Myrmidon, be 
> ready for action. Jhiaxus, it wont be the promised show but we hadnt 
> choice, I'll let you do whatever you want with the lady later, except
> kill her... but if you want see the alternative show, follow 
> PErceptor's signature and meet me there... bring the lady with you if
> you wish"

Myrmidon smiled for a moment as his energy levels went up, he was
excited at the prospect of doing somehting other then sitting here in
the base. As quickly as it came though, so it passed as his warrior
instincts and training kicked in, as he swiftly started moving towards
the exit, "Since I can remain hidden and unoticed by sensors, I will
patrol the outside then, keep an eye out for unwanted visitors."

Preston
(Myrmidon)
